doc:
Wayne Heffley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wayne_Heffley 0 Wayne Heffley (July 15, 1927 – November 19, 2008) was an American television and film actor, known for the role of Vern Scofield on Days of Our Lives, as well as over 100 other roles. He died of kidney failure in 2008. Wayne_Heffley ( July_15_,_1927 – November_19_,_2008 ) was an_American_television_and_film_actor , known for the_role of Vern_Scofield on Days of Our_Lives , as_well_as over_100_other_roles . He died of kidney_failure in 2008 .
